lapply(c("kappe.tex", "article.tex"), function(doc){
  tx  = readLines(doc)
  index = grep("\\\\begin\\{document", tx)
  tx2  = tx[-c(1:index, length(tx))]
  writeLines(tx2, con = doc)
  return()
})
writeLines(readLines("resource/frontpage.tex"), con = "frontpage.tex")
